Tip.Title: Generate Interface Implementation
Tip.Description: Need to implement an interface? Tap Alt+Return on an interface and use the Generate Interface action to create a class for that interface.

Tip.Title: Go To Implementation
Tip.Description: You can use MFractors Go-To Implementation shortcut to find classes that implement that interface and then jump to that class!

Tip.Title: Generate Event Handler
Tip.Description: Use the Generate Event Handler code fix to generate an event handler method on a XAML files code behind class.

Tip.Title: Generate XAML View From XAML Node
Tip.Description: Did you know you can create new controls from XAML? Right click on a missing control to create a new control implementation!

Tip.Title: Import Namespace And Assembly For Unresolved XAML Node
Tip.Description: Use the Import Reference fix to generate an xmlns namespace import for a missing control in your XAML.

Tip.Title: Generate Effect From XAML Declaration
Tip.Description: Use the Generate Effect code action to create an effect and it's platform specific implementations

Tip.Title: Go To Code Behind Class
Tip.Description: When you are in a ViewModel or XAML file, the Go-To Code Behind code action will navigate you to it's code behind class

Tip.Title: Go To XAML View
Tip.Description: When you are in a ViewModel or code-behind, the Go-To Code XAML View code action will navigate you to it's XAML view.

Tip.Title: Go To View Model
Tip.Description: When you are in a XAML file or it's code behind, the Go-To ViewModel code action will infer your view model and navigate to it.

Tip.Title: Edit Color Declaration
Tip.Description: Use the Edit Color code action to visually edit a color from your Xaml.

Tip.Title: Migrate OnPlatform Usage
Tip.Description: Use the Migrate OnPlatform code action to convert OnPlatform declarations to the Xamarin.Forms 2.3.4 format.

Tip.Title: Replace String With Localisation Lookup
Tip.Description: Need to localise your XAML? The Localisation Wizard moves string literals into RESX files and replaces that string with a localisation lookup!

Tip.Title: Generate New View Model
Tip.Description: Use the Generate View Model code action to create a new view model for a XAML file with default implementations of each data-binding!

Tip.Title: Implement Missing Members
Tip.Description: Use the Generate Bindable Properties code action to create new bindable properties; it'll even figure out the property types for you!

Tip.Title: Generate Xaml Localisation Infrastructure
Tip.Description: The Generate Localisation Infrastructure action creates the code to power XAML localisation according to Xamarins best practices.

Tip.Title: Import Missing Image Resource
Tip.Description: When you are missing an image resource, MFractor will warn you and give you the option to import it into your Android and iOS projects.

Tip.Title: Replace String With Resource Lookup
Tip.Description: You can use the localisation wizard to find and move all C# strings into a RESX file, replacing the original string with a resource lookup!
